mysql_groundtruth: SELECT NAME FROM SALESPERSON AS S WHERE ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDERS AS O JOIN COMPANY AS C ON O.COM_ID = C.COM_ID WHERE O.SALES_ID = S.SALES_ID AND C.NAME = 'RED' ) = 0
SELECT S.NAME FROM COMPANY C INNER JOIN ORDERS O ON (C.COM_ID = O.COM_ID AND C.NAME = 'RED') RIGHT JOIN SALESPERSON S ON(O.SALES_ID = S.SALES_ID) WHERE O.SALES_ID IS NULL
